scripts.html-build: mkdir dist && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp -R src/html dist/pages
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run html-build && npm run css-build && npm run js-build && npm run cp-cname
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git commit -a && git subtree split --prefix dist -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages
scripts.deploy-fake: npm run build && git commit -a && git subtree split --prefix dist -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages
